metadata.synopsis: Tribunal Sewer Hall - Skull Poems - Along the south stone wall, at approximately CTY_Main_A, Position: -1313.75, 2.38, 517.25, place a series of four skulls affixed to the wall just above head level, in a row with about 5 feet between each of them. Use our regular pick-up-able skulls so we can make these interactive (though you can't pick them up). When you click on a skull, it plays a Narrator AD.

0.speaker: Narrator
0.text: *It's a poem! It continues, 'Is a burden to great and to small'*
